title: Fix TAYARI logo transparent background and shrink signature on SplashScreen

requirements.text: In SplashScreen.tsx, apply CSS mix-blend-mode: multiply (or equivalent technique) to the TAYARI logo image so its white/checkered background becomes transparent and blends seamlessly with the teal/green gradient background of the intro page.

quotes: png bg intro page ko color sanga milos

acceptanceCriteria: The TAYARI logo no longer shows a visible white or checkered box around it on the splash screen.
The logo graphic appears to float directly on the teal gradient background.
No white rectangle or checkered pattern is visible behind the logo.

requirements.text: In SplashScreen.tsx, make the signature image (जनक प्रसाद पाण्डे) smaller in size and remove its black background box by applying mix-blend-mode: multiply or screen so the signature blends with the teal gradient background without any black rectangle visible.

quotes: Signature (जनक प्रसाद पाण्डे) — कालो black box background हटाएर हल्का र साना बनाउने

acceptanceCriteria: The signature image is noticeably smaller than its current size on the splash screen.
No black rectangular background box is visible around the signature.
The signature text/graphic blends with the teal gradient background.
The 'जनक प्रसाद पाण्डे' label below the signature remains visible.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Only modify SplashScreen.tsx and related CSS/styling — do not alter other pages or components.
nonGoals: Replacing the actual PNG image files with new transparent versions.
Changes to any page other than the SplashScreen/intro page.
